message: Accept this generous offer and we can call it a day!
Take it or leave it, Alice! 75% for me, 25% for you.
Meet me halfway, Bob! Let's split it fairly.
I'm getting closer to my target, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting closer to your target, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not going to let you walk away with the majority, Bob. It's time to make a move!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking the majority now!
Last chance, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk away with the majority. Meet me at 80-20!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. 90% for me, 10% for you, take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm not budging. Take it or leave it!
Fine, have it your way, Alice. I'll take 99.9% and you get 0.1%. It's the best you'll get!
